lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton belittled Mr. Trump’s record as a businessman and said his economic policies would cause a global recession.

byline.contributor: Matt Flegenheimer reported from Columbus, and Amy Chozick from New York.
byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and AMY CHOZICK

headline.print_headline: Clinton Says Trump Would Cause a Recession and ‘Global Panic’
headline.main: Hillary Clinton Makes Dire Predictions for Economy if Donald Trump Wins

snippet: Mrs. Clinton belittled Mr. Trump’s record as a businessman and said his economic policies would cause a global recession.
abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton attacks Donald J Trump's business record and economic plans, saying he will cause recession and global panic if elected president; cites his various business failures.
